dialogueLines.line: I must say, you've caught my eye with your singing technique.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Hmph, well I suppose a troglodyte like you wouldn't ever be acquainted with someone of my prestige.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: You better watch what you say.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Answer my question before I reduce you into a pile of sand.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: I am PRIS-ma, a distinguished being from the third dimension.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: You see, I've gathered you and a handful of other lowly 2D beings to my domain. I've been working behind the scenes to instigate those musical battles you all seem to love so much.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Can't say I'm fond of what you're doing.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: I'm the one who toys with people here, not you.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Now, now. Why don't we make a bet?
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Let's have a little singing competition.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: If you win, I'll let you and everyone else go. If I win-
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Don't bother telling me. I'll win anyways.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
